content: janne yoga socks are a dk weight yoga sock pattern the special thing about yoga socks is the fact that they don t have a heel or tip this allows you to have a good grip to your yoga mat while still having warm feet another benefit is that having no heel or tip makes yoga socks the perfect project for beginner knitters **size** the pattern comes in one size the length however is customizable which makes the pattern suitable for many eu sizes size 37 - size 42 the pattern is also easily adjustable to a higher stitch count **yarn** the pattern suggests to use a dk weight sock yarn or two strands of fingering weight sock yarn **needles** 3 5 mm double pointed needles or circular needles to work the magic loop technique general note as a one-woman-show i translated this pattern myself as a native german grammar mistakes in the english pattern can occur if you have any questions or problems please contact me at quasigerade@web de - thank you so much for your support happy knitting bella
